description: Complete Scholar system audit via 20 focused, verifiable reports

userStories.title: Inventory Scholar files and outputs
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a complete inventory of Scholar directories, key files, and output lanes so the audit has a stable baseline.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Directories, Key Files, Output Lanes, and Notable Recent Artifacts (with paths)
Reference file paths for each item listed

userStories.title: Map Scholar system components and flow
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a system map that connects Scholar components, data sources, and outputs so dependencies are clear.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Components, Data Flow, Dependencies, and Hand-offs
Use explicit file path references for each component

userStories.title: Document Scholar entrypoints and triggers
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to know how Scholar is started and what scripts or workflows trigger it.
acceptanceCriteria: List every known entrypoint (scripts, docs, manual steps) with file path references
Call out any missing or ambiguous entrypoints

userStories.title: Build Scholar inputs and outputs matrix
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a clear inputs/outputs matrix so I can see how data moves through Scholar.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Inputs, Outputs, Transformations, and Storage Lanes
Reference ai_artifacts_manifest.json and audit_manifest.json in the mapping

userStories.title: Audit Scholar workflow docs
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want an audit of workflow markdown files to confirm expected behavior and missing steps.
acceptanceCriteria: Cover files in scholar/workflows/*.md (including orchestrator_loop.md and orchestrator_run_prompt.md)
Include findings for: intent, required inputs, outputs, and gaps

userStories.title: Audit Scholar agent prompts
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to understand each agent prompt and its responsibilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Cover files in scholar/workflows/agents/*.md with role, inputs, outputs, and risks
Call out any missing role coverage

userStories.title: Audit brain_reader.py
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a focused audit of brain_reader.py so I understand its purpose and dependencies.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Purpose, Inputs, Outputs, Key Functions, Dependencies, and Risks
Reference relevant function names and file paths

userStories.title: Audit telemetry_snapshot.py
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a focused audit of telemetry_snapshot.py to understand how telemetry is captured.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Purpose, Inputs, Outputs, Key Functions, Dependencies, and Risks
Reference relevant function names and file paths

userStories.title: Audit friction_alerts.py
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a focused audit of friction_alerts.py to understand alert generation and data needs.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Purpose, Inputs, Outputs, Key Functions, Dependencies, and Risks
Reference relevant function names and file paths

userStories.title: Audit Scholar docs and templates
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want an audit of Scholar docs and templates to spot inconsistencies or missing guidance.
acceptanceCriteria: List inconsistencies, missing guidance, or outdated references

userStories.title: Document Scholar dependencies on other repo areas
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a dependency map showing how Scholar relies on brain, sop, scripts, or other systems.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Direct Dependencies, Indirect Dependencies, and Risky Couplings
Reference file paths for each dependency

userStories.title: Create Scholar runbook and prerequisites
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a runbook that explains how to execute Scholar and what prerequisites it needs.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Prerequisites, Step-by-step Run, Expected Outputs, and Failure Modes
Call out any missing steps that prevent a clean run

userStories.title: Audit Scholar observability and telemetry
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to know how Scholar captures telemetry and whether it is sufficient.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Telemetry Sources, Metrics/Signals, Gaps, and Recommendations
Reference telemetry_snapshot.py and any output artifacts

userStories.title: Audit Scholar validation and tests
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to know what validation exists for Scholar and what is missing.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Existing Checks, Missing Tests, and Suggested Validation
Reference any scripts or docs that mention validation

userStories.title: Analyze AI artifact coverage gaps
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to see which AI artifacts are missing versus the manifest and audit plan.
acceptanceCriteria: Compare actual artifacts under scholar/outputs to ai_artifacts_manifest.json and audit_manifest.json
List missing artifacts with expected file patterns

userStories.title: Identify Scholar risks and weaknesses
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a structured list of risks and weaknesses in the Scholar system.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Technical Risks, Process Risks, and Data Risks
Tie each risk to a source file path or artifact

userStories.title: Assess whether Scholar is actually working
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a clear working-status assessment based on evidence, not assumptions.
acceptanceCriteria: Include sections: Evidence of Recent Runs, Blocking Issues, and Verification Plan
State what is confirmed vs unconfirmed

userStories.title: Capture open questions for Scholar
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a list of unresolved questions that must be answered to fully trust Scholar.
acceptanceCriteria: Group questions by area (workflows, data, outputs, validation)
Reference file paths tied to each question

userStories.title: Produce Scholar recommendations backlog
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a prioritized backlog of improvements based on audit findings.
acceptanceCriteria: Include a priority table with effort and impact estimates
Link recommendations to specific gaps or risks

userStories.title: Write Scholar audit digest
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a concise digest that summarizes the 20-pass audit.
acceptanceCriteria: Summarize key findings, gaps, and working-status conclusion
Reference the main audit files produced in earlier stories
